channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: TSMC Founder Morris Chang Receives Civilian Medal for Tech Contributions
item.description: President Tsai Ing-wen has awarded TSMC founder Morris Chang the Order of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, the second-highest civilian medal in Taiwan, for his contributions to Taiwan's high-tech

item.title: Students Protest Lingering Gender Inequality in Education in Taiwan
item.description: A group of students say 20 years after a landmark gender equality law passed, there are still serious gender-based inequities in education.

item.title: Taiwan Provides Compensation for Formosan Black Bear Damage
item.description: Farmers in Taiwan can now receive compensation if a Formosan Black Bear damages their property.

item.title: Foreign Ministry: Reports of Leaked Documents 'Cognitive Warfare'
item.description: Taiwan's foriegn ministry has called reports of leaked confidential documents for sale on the dark web a case of "cognitive warfare" and asked the public not to fall for false info
